I think one of our one of our greatest examples of a smart city system [music] has been our partnership between Ezri, Nvidia, Microsoft, and the city of Raleigh looking at their traffic system [music] and really trying to create a digital twin of how [music] traffic is moving through their city and giving their city planners and their traffic managers [music] visibility into that flow and also allowing them to plan for better ways ways to move folks through the city. [music] And it's also giving their first responders ability to respond to incidents in real time [music] as they're being observed.
